spell_list.description: When the first increment of Ferocity of Spirits is gained, the mystic gains a short duration augmentation that improves the size of their wards. This effect applies before potency. Cannot trigger more than once every 30 seconds.
spell_list.description_pvp: When the first increment of Ferocity of Spirits is gained, the mystic gains a short duration augmentation that improves the size of their wards. This effect applies before potency. Cannot trigger more than once every 30 seconds.

effect_list.description: Increases the amount of the mystic's wards when the mystic gets one increment of Ferocity of Spirits by 24%. This applies before potency.

spell_list.name: White Wolf's Howl
